string.text: The technician needs radio parts before he'll install this upgrade. Rumors suggest there may be some at the cement plant. You should bring back any you find there.
Mod files are corrupted, game cannot load! \nWe recommend running CheckUpdates.exe to try and fix any problems, or reinstall the mod.

As an experienced stalker, you know all too well that today's ally can turn into tomorrow's enemy - and vice versa. When performing tasks, you try not to draw attention to yourself, and look for bloodless ways of achieving your goals whenever possible.
Owl will now offer silencers for almost any weapon found in the Zone.
